attributes.action: provide free transport nationally for people over 70
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many elderly people cannot afford to use public transport and the subsequent isolation in their own homes causes depression and as a follow on many physical problems.  Being able to travel keeps people healthy and happy and  would save money for the NHS. In the Republic of Ireland travel is free for the over 70s and is of great benefit to them.
